Posters

While many would consider logos the most concentrated and economical form of visual design, I disagree. Logos, even the most recognizable, are part of a larger system. Posters can exist by their lonesome. In fact, they can create comlplex visual systems and identites within their small frame. Here I explore this furtile design ground.

Show Posters

An Incomplete Manifesto for Growth

Based off of Bruce Mau’s An Incomplete Manifesto for Growth, I created this series of posters illustrating each point. Some are literal, others are non-sequiturial, most fall somewhere between. I currently have the first 23 posters complete. I plan to finish the series in 2015.
